name: Melffy Panda
text: If your opponent Normal or Special Summons a monster(s) (except during the Damage Step), or if an opponent's monster targets this card for an attack: You can return this card to the hand, then you can Special Summon 1 Level 2 or lower Beast monster from your GY, except "Melffy Panda". During your End Phase: You can Special Summon this card from your hand. You can only use each effect of "Melffy Panda" once per turn.
